#### **Overview**  
This project involved building an interactive dashboard to analyze college students' price sensitivity toward streaming services like Netflix, Hulu, and Disney+. Using R and Shiny, I visualized insights from survey data to evaluate willingness to pay, perceived value, and brand preference.

::: {.columns}
::: {.column width="50%"}
#### **Learning Outcomes**  
- Applied Gabor-Granger pricing model to survey data  
- Visualized customer value perception across platforms  
- Identified price thresholds and service bundling opportunities  
- Used reactive inputs to enable real-time data exploration  
- Delivered insights to support pricing strategy decisions
:::
::: {.column width="50%"}
#### **Key Skills Gained**  
- Consumer pricing analysis  
- Survey data wrangling in R  
- Interactive data storytelling  
- Strategic marketing insights
:::
